sn29.5:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.5:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce saṃsedajā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti?
sn29.5:1.5: “Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena m’idhekacce saṃsedajā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti.
